title: Immortal Champion
description: Part of a Viking crew of warriors cursed by an evil sorceress, Gunnar the Red must toil through eternity as half-man, half-beast, living out his days as a great bull, while his nights are spent in human form. And though he keeps mostly to the wilds, his heart yearns for the simple comforts of man--and the chance to redeem a tragic past.Â Only the magic of true love can release him. Though she is betrothed to another, could Lady Eleanor de Neville be his salvation?
author: Lisa Hendrix
